languages.text:
Медный шепот использует силу Эсхатоса, чтобы заклинить все аугментации и механизмы в телах противников. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Не действует на Паскаля.
languages.original_text: Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies on the battlefield for 1 round.

languages.text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.
languages.original_text:
Медный шепот использует силу Эсхатоса, чтобы заклинить все аугментации и механизмы в телах противников. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Не действует на Паскаля.

traits.locale_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

languages.text:
Susurro de latón usa el poder de Eschatos para anular todos los aumentos y mecanismos de los cuerpos de sus enemigos. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
No afecta a Pasqal.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

traits.locale_text:
Susurro de latón usa el poder de Eschatos para anular todos los aumentos y mecanismos de los cuerpos de sus enemigos. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
No afecta a Pasqal.

languages.text:
铜语会利用终焉审判的力量，阻塞敌人体内所有植入物与机械装置。此效果影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此效果对帕斯卡没有影响。
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

traits.locale_text:
铜语会利用终焉审判的力量，阻塞敌人体内所有植入物与机械装置。此效果影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此效果对帕斯卡没有影响。

铜语会利用终焉审判的力量，阻塞敌人体内所有植入物与机械装置。此效果影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此效果对帕斯卡没有影响。

languages.text:
ブラスウィスパーは、エスカトスの力を使って、自身の敵の体内にある全ての増強装置や機構を故障させる。ターゲットは、−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しないと、 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。
パスカルには影響しない。
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

traits.locale_text:
ブラスウィスパーは、エスカトスの力を使って、自身の敵の体内にある全ての増強装置や機構を故障させる。ターゲットは、−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} 抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと、 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。
パスカルには影響しない。

ブラスウィスパーは、エスカトスの力を使って、自身の敵の体内にある全ての増強装置や機構を故障させる。ターゲットは、−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g} 抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと、 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。
パスカルには影響しない。

languages.text:
Messingflüsterer nutzt die Macht des Eschatos, um alle Augmentationen und Mechanismen in den Körpern ihrer Feinde zu blockieren. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.
Hat keinen Einfluss auf Pasqal.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

traits.locale_text:
Brasswhisper nutzt die Macht des Eschatos, um alle Erweiterungen und Mechanismen in den Körpern ihrer Feinde zu blockieren. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, und zwar 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang.
Hat keinen Einfluss auf Pasqal.

languages.text:
Murmecuivre utilise le pouvoir d'Eschatos pour bloquer l'ensemble des augmentations et des mécanismes présents dans le corps de ses ennemis. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
N'affecte pas Pasqal.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.

traits.locale_text:
Murmecuivre utilise le pouvoir d'Eschatos pour bloquer l'ensemble des augmentations et des mécanismes présents dans le corps de ses ennemis. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
N'affecte pas Pasqal.

languages.text:
Pirinçfısıltı, Eskatos'un gücünü kullanarak düşmanlarının bedenlerindeki tüm ogmentasyon ve mekanizmalara tutukluk yaptırır. Hedefler, −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
Pasqal'a etki etmez.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper uses the power of Eschatos to jam all augmentations and mechanisms in the bodies of her enemies. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Does not affect Pasqal.
